channel.title: iis on Suburban Nerd
channel.description: Recent content in iis on Suburban Nerd

item.title: Sebastian on MS IIS' FastCGI support.
item.description: 09:30 there is absolutely no way to detect the server base as far as i can see 09:33 you really have to do horrible things with PATH_TRANSLATED... 09:34 seriously... was that thing developed by a bunch of monkeys? 10:00 yeah, they were trying to write shakespeare's collected works, and ended up with IIS instead
